SECTION_CONTENT:
Use personal protective equipment. Evacuate personnel to safe areas. Avoid contact with
skin, eyes and clothing.
Do not allow material to contaminate ground water system. Should not be released into the
environment. Do not flush into surface water or sanitary sewer system. See Section 12 for
additional ecological information.
Avoid dust formation. Sweep up or vacuum up spillage and collect in suitable container for
disposal.

skin, eyes and clothing.

additional ecological information.
Avoid dust formation. Sweep up or vacuum up spillage and collect in suitable container for
disposal.
